scripts.tag: riot src/tag building/tag && mv building/tag public/app/tag
scripts.compile: npm run tag && npm run lib && npm run client
scripts.develop: npm run clean; npm run prepare; npm run less && npm run compile && npm run webpack
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run prepare; npm run less && npm run compile && npm run webpack && npm run uglify; npm run clean
scripts.prepare: mkdir building; mkdir building/lib; mkdir building/client
scripts.clean: rm -R building; rm -f public/app/main.css; rm -f public/app/bundle.js; rm -Rf public/app/tag
